sentences.sContent: Children love jokes and riddles that are heavily formulaic.
sentences.sCn: 小孩子喜欢一些充满套语的笑话和谜语。

synos.tran: 公式化的；刻板的；套话堆砌的

words.tran: [数] 公式，准则；配方；婴儿食品
构想，规划；公式化；简洁陈述
公式集；处方一览表；套话
规划；用公式表示；明确地表达

trans.tranOther: containing or made from ideas or expressions that have been used many times before and are therefore not very new or interesting
